extendedInfo.description: Protected Notes is a secure,easy and simple way to store and access you personal and private information anywhere, anytime and on any of your devices. Secure your notes/information with your own chosen password and finally ensure privacy in your Notes! Protected Notes is a simple password protected notepad application that allows you to save all your private info with a password that is chosen by you when you first open the application. âââââââââââââââââââââ - Backup and synchronization âââââââââââââââââââââ The app allows you to save and synchronize all your data on secured server under your own password. This way you can have the same diary entries on all your devices and add data from wherever you want. ââââââââââââââââââââ - Change the look and feel ââââââââââââââââââââ Custom themes: Allows you to change between font styles and backgrounds to best fit you mood Keep you private information safe and secured whit password Protected Notes. Enjoy!Tags : secret,notes,password,protected,my secret notes,secret notes,protected notes,notes with password

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.comment: I have an HTC HD2. App did not allow writing complete words,  only one letter at a time which is much too slow and impractical. Seemed jerky  when loading.  Perhaps it works better on other phones.
reviews.author: Raina Suominen
